summary: This document is a sealed grand jury subpoena and non-disclosure order issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Amazon.com, Inc. It demands records related to specific email addresses and shipping addresses associated with Jeffrey Epstein, as part of an investigation into violations including sex trafficking and conspiracy. The order prohibits Amazon from notifying the subscriber about the subpoena for 365 days.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the subpoena and accompanying letter as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Sarah Netburn
persons.context: Signed the non-disclosure order, sealing the subpoena application.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date for Amazon
events.description: Date by which Amazon.com, Inc. was commanded to appear before the grand jury or produce requested records.

events.title: Issuance of Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: Date the grand jury subpoena was issued to Amazon.com, Inc. for records related to specific email accounts and addresses.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida 33480
49 Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, New Mexico, 87056
United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, New York, NY
300 Deschutes Way SW, Suite 304 Tumwater, WA 98501
keyFacts: The subpoena targets records for email addresses strongly associated with Jeffrey Epstein (e.g., jeeitunes@gmail.com, jeffityepsteinorg@gmail.com, littlestjeff@yahoo.com).
It seeks Amazon order history, payment methods, and subscriber info for accounts linked to three of Epstein's known properties in Palm Beach, New York City, and New Mexico.
A non-disclosure order prohibits Amazon from notifying the subscriber about the subpoena for 365 days, citing risks like witness intimidation and evidence destruction.
The investigation involves suspected violations of federal statutes including 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking) and 2422(b) (coercion and enticement).
The document reveals an active federal grand jury investigation into Epstein as of June 2019, shortly before his arrest in July 2019.
